description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows mobile broadband driver associated with CVE-2024-29998:

1. Download and apply the update packages listed below corresponding to your Windows version.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix targets the improper input validation vulnerability that could allow remote code execution via interaction with the mobile broadband driver.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the links provided:
   - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows versions as listed:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3593)
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2 (10.0.22621.3593)
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2 (10.0.22000.2960)
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 (10.0.19045.4412)
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 (10.0.19044.4412)
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
